name: Seth H. STEINMAN, Petitioner v. Lisette SHIRDAN-HARRIS, Judge, Respondent

parties: Seth H. STEINMAN, Petitioner v. Lisette SHIRDAN-HARRIS, Judge, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of April, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The judge’s name is to be stricken from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
969 A.2d 1183
Seth H. STEINMAN, Petitioner v. Lisette SHIRDAN-HARRIS, Judge, Respondent.
No. 27 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 23, 2009.
